记录，11日下午一点五十分，17251评价，18%好评率。
16-23，你的热爱再大地精靠迪克面前一无是处，他不会有任何怜悯，只会用你的热爱攫取更多的利润。
当你想给好评的时候，请您思考再三。这是守望先锋2，不是那个拥有上勾拳和朋友们的守望先锋。
最后，靠迪克，我由衷的祝愿你先生，希望你在明天就可以发生车祸，飞出十米，心脏上插上木桩，并在阳光下炙烤。
Finally, Kodik, sir，I sincerely wish you,, that  you will have a car accident tomorrow，you can fly ten meters out, stick a stake in your heart, and scorch in the sun.

从16年开始玩的 也是我第一次接触fps游戏
因为ow认识了很多很好的朋友 每天起来第一件事就是ow启动
这游戏带给我太多太多了 虽然后来渐渐的因为各种原因没有继续玩了
但是丝毫没有影响它在我心中的地位 
直到ow2的出现 从“守望先锋真好玩”到“守望先锋狗都不玩”
还没出的时候还有点期待 到后来体验之后真的是依托答辩 
再到后来的暴雪关掉了国服 它在我这就已经死了
再也没有守望先锋了
守望先锋依然是我心中最好的游戏 但ow2不是
还有很多很多想说的 但是不知道从何说起了

我草你妈个b的暴雪，老子玩了7年的守望先锋，你他吗逼带走了我七年的时间，傻逼玩意，你个狗东西，贪你妈呢，在中国你还这么玩，傻逼东西，我操死你的妈，有种你就别上简中，你个傻逼也永远别回来，私服服务器比你那个傻逼服务器好他妈多了，傻逼东西我操死你妈的
我记得，当初她是我们初中的学委，我追了她三年，后来，她同意了。有次我花98买了份守望先锋，她说我乱花钱，不带她去疯狂星期四，她给我发消息，我总是因为打游戏没看到，于是她和我分手了。分手以后，＊＊送典藏版，但是我却没有在看见过她，我只能抱着电脑痛哭，然后我在朋友圈刷到了她的王者精英v8账号。我明白了，那晚我喝了一瓶尊尼获加，后来我因为酒精过敏住院了，从那以后，我再也不去医院了。
I absolutely LOVED this game and to an extent still do. Though seeing how much it has devolved is incredibly saddening. I can't recommend this to anyone new as much as i want to. Save yourself!!!!!

狗屎玩意
从前我为了一只狗不惜在一个报停下排了4个小时的队，就位了把它带回家，确实如愿以偿，我细心的照料它，它要什么我给什么，而后慢慢的它长大了，但是变得越来越陌生，它他妈的竟然开始噬主了！它说要离开我，我他妈养了你10多年，你告诉我你要离开我？所以狗就是狗，本来以为能养熟的，结果还是他妈的一条流浪狗，现在好了，它有了新的主人，带它去了新家，但是让我看到了，所以我过来骂骂这只傻逼狗！
商人逐利，本无可厚非，但损害玩家利益，对自己还没半点好处，只能说是弱智。

I downloaded just to leave my review because I needed an outlet more than anything. I likely won't say anything uniquely profound, but still, I need to say something. I wish I could be happy about Overwatch 2 coming to Steam, but Overwatch 2 is pretty much dead to me. I want to love it, but I can't just put a band-aid on it and say it's all better. I played TF2 for a long while until things fell apart due to the cheaters and bots (they have made a resurgence but it's hard to go back when I'm scared of losing those great memories I made then) so i moved over to Overwatch, and I had a great time! I played almost until I was silver-and-gold bordered, I had almost every cosmetic for every character including the event and league special skins (none of the Blizzcon ones, except the Sombra one because they gave it away in an event) and it was just a comfortable place to be. When blizzard announced the PVE-centric Overwatch 2, I was thrilled! When all things are said and done I'm not much for PVP environments (I know I play a lot of Siege and PUBG but friends got me invested and now I'm in too deep...). I even bought all the pre-launch packs and participated in the beta, prepared to dive headfirst into OW2. Off the bat they say only pvp was being released initially, then laid out a whole plan for how they were moving forward with PVE (the main selling point, to me at least) being released later after it received more polish and whatnot. I wasn't excited about that, but I was willing to patiently wait. The battle pass replacing crates was a bit of a shift, on one hand you used to have to rely on luck to get the thing you wanted (or buy it with coins when inevitably every loot-box you opened was a dupe as was in my case because i had nearly all the cosmetics) but you COULD get the things you wanted without paying extra for them. Even the league skins you used to be able to get just by watching enough league matches (this may be unchanged??). The new system, however, prioritizes money and so you can't get the skin you want without shelling out money. Additionally, I didn't like the frequency of the new heroes being added. On paper it sounds great, new heroes, new ways to play. But it realistically means too many balance changes and it compounds somewhat, with each hero having to have an appropriate balance with and against every other hero. Each one either takes more work than the last (and also may involve balance changes to existing heroes) or is done sloppily with no care for balance. Also, some players don't have all the characters, meaning some teams are less capable to handle different situations and properly counter than other teams who have more money to burn. There were also several smaller issues I wasn't particularly fond of, and they were adding up. Mind you, that's not even including the ever-distressing news of what is and has been happening at blizzard as a company, but I held onto hope for my relaxing PVE missions that I was promised before I made many purchases. They took away my Overwatch 1 so what else could I do? Then the bombshell, Blizzard decided they were going to be scrapping the plans for the PVE content, just releasing the unfinished content they had, slapping a price tag on it, and saying essentially "this is too hard so we quit". The thing I was most excited for, waited very patiently for, and that they themselves had hyped up for so long wasn't going to happen, "Thanks for the money!". What's worse, is that they even knew before launch that they wouldn't be completing the PVE content and they still led us by the noses until we had given them all our money before they told us. I think it's despicable and a disgrace to the years I enjoyed playing Overwatch. I personally will not be giving Overwatch 2 nor Blizzard any more money or time until they at the VERY LEAST fix their mistakes, though even then probably not. I feel like I have been scammed. I was scammed.

还记得当年第一次看主播玩守望先锋，第一次在免费周体验守望先锋，得到自己的电脑时立刻下载守望先锋，然后是一代结束，二代开始，最后是国服停服。随之离去的还有我的炉石传说，风暴英雄，魔兽世界。我以前认为每一个暴黑曾经都是暴白只是说说而已，现在我知道了这话不是空穴来风。在听说守望先锋要上steam时我提前一天写了一篇接近一千字的差评准备发布，而现在我把文章删了，因为真的累了。我只想说一句，暴雪，你妈什么时候似啊。
另外，通过挂时长可以不下游戏而去打差评

如果2016年的时候暴雪的总部被陨石砸了，那么暴雪会变成本世纪最传奇的游戏公司。
如果2018时候暴雪的总部被陨石砸了，它将是一家值得怀念的游戏公司。
如果2020年的时候被陨石砸了，它将是一家令人惋惜的游戏公司。
如果今年被陨石砸了它将是一颗完美的陨石。
烤迪克nmsl，这个世界再也不需要守望先锋了。

[b] Объективно хорошая игра [/b]
Графика, дизайн персонажей, анимации сделаны на высоком уровне
Игру постоянно обновляют и добавляют что-то новое
В год выходит как минимум 2-3 новых героя и 3 новые карты
Появились события с наградами
Обновили кастомизацию профиля и персонажей
Появились испытания в ходе которых, выдают звания
Добавили прогресс уровня персонажа
В аркадах появились новые режимы
Поменяли соревновательный режим
Обновили основной режим 5v5 который стал намного удобнее, чем раньше 6v6
Еще со времен OW1 в игре есть уровни репутации, кастомки, внутриигровые ачивки, полная статистика по каждому персонажу, запись моментов, просмотр повторов матчей

С выходом OW2 в стим, добавили дополнительно ачивки на аккаунт стима, которые синхронизируются с аккаунтом баттлнет и удобную возможность заходить в игру из самого используемого лаунчера
